name: Emagge
description: Emgage puts your HR on autopilot with a dedicated Virtual HR Manager, Streamlines your Human Resource policies and practices, and Automates your employee life cycle management from Onboarding to Separation. 70% of MSMEs in India do not have an HR department and at Emgage our vision is to empower 50,000 MSMEs in the next 5 years by providing enterprise-level HR experience at an affordable cost.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
sub_categories: Software and Services Related to HR Software
Headline: On a mission to empower 50k MSMEs through Virtual HR Team
ShortDescription: A lot of people ask me “Why do we build Emgage?” I agree, there are plenty of HRMS options out there, but the problem is, none of them are built keeping in mind the challenges of growing startups or SMEs or their founders!
enhanced_description: Emgage offers a comprehensive HR solution designed to put HR on autopilot for Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs), particularly addressing the needs of growing startups and SMEs and their founders in India. It provides a dedicated Virtual HR Manager to streamline human resource policies and practices and automate the entire employee lifecycle, from onboarding to separation. Emgage aims to empower 50,000 MSMEs in India within the next five years by delivering an affordable, enterprise-level HR experience. Core features include Leave & Attendance management, Payroll & Compliances, and Performance Management. The platform also focuses on helping businesses hire top talent faster and more efficiently, boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity through data-driven hiring and best practices, acknowledging that many existing HRMS options do not adequately cater to the specific challenges faced by these growing businesses.
key_use_cases: Automating employee lifecycle management (Onboarding to Separation)
Streamlining Human Resource policies and practices
competitive_advantages: Specifically built to address challenges of growing startups and SMEs/founders
Provides enterprise-level HR experience at an affordable cost for MSMEs
Targets the market of MSMEs lacking an HR department (70% in India)
Focuses on data-driven hiring and best practices
roi_benefits: Access to enterprise-level HR experience at affordable cost
Faster and more efficient talent acquisition
Boosted hiring manager confidence and productivity
